name: Histories
description:
ANKHESENAMUN

ANKHESENAMUN'S HISTORIES Play as the scholar ANKHESENAMUN that has taken on the daunting task of following the footsteps of the great Historian HERODOTUS. Explore the realms unknown to humans and meet the most surreal life forms, while our adventurous scholar uncovers the secrets of these fascinating realms... Follow on Twitter Ankhesenamun Checkout  Akhesenamun's YouTube Audio Production by LAX HEAD Screenshots
